website_summaries.verdict: Ideal for those who suffer from very dry hair and split ends.
pros: Strengthens hair and keeps ends from breaking
cons: Some users don't enjoy the smell

customer_reviews.title: Consistency and smell changed!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this product before direct from the Morrocanoil site. It’s a relatively small tube and consistency and smell should not change halfway through. When I first used this product it felt correct and had the right scent. Morrocanoil has a VERY DISTINCT SMELL. It changed into something like cheap hand lotion as it got closer to the bottom of the tube. I have been advised to not purchase Maroccanoil products from Amazon to purchase directly from their website. There is A LOT of counterfeit product on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: D'elle

customer_reviews.title: This works wonders!
customer_reviews.text: This works wonders! Your hair soft vibrant shiny. It is a little pricey,but the same price every where we looked to purchase it so save yourself sometime looking around town and just order it off Amazon. It also last a long time too a little goes a long way. .... and yes this is my natural grown hair blow dryer and flat ironed! love the mask it restores your hairs luster!
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: FAKE PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is fake!!! I have never written a review before, but this really made me mad. I thought it was a good deal because it is twenty dollars less than what I paid at the salon. The color and consistency are not even close. It smells the same and comes in the same container - that's it!! I'm not sure how they pull this off, but if you want real Moroccan Oil ptoducts, don't buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Witt

customer_reviews.title: but this product was horrible for it
customer_reviews.text: I have texlaxed hair, very thick and mid back...this product morphed my semi manageable hair into a nightmare...when I tell you that it tangled and hardened by hair beyond belief...oh my ...it took me three hours to untangle my hair and at one point I just gave up and had to cut out some knots..further, the breakage was huge!!!..so I was tired and furious by the time I was finished setting my hair. There was no hydration and nothing positive I can even say. I threw the rest of this stuff away..wouldn't wish it on anyone. I dont know if it was the texture of my hair or what, but this product was horrible for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the best. Use it when you can leave it on ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the best. Use it when you can leave it on for a while - I wash my hair, towel dry, put it on, put on a shower cap and let it sit for at least a couple of hours or overnight if you can. Wash out thoroughly in the morning. Increases the manageability and the shine of your hair. Get the big size 16.9 oz as it is by far the best buy.
customer_reviews.author: Julia loves Amazon

customer_reviews.title: A really outstanding conditioner
customer_reviews.text: I've used a LOT of hair conditioners over the years. I was surprised to find this is so great! I like Moroccanoil hair oil, shampoo and conditioner. I like to switch products because I think my hair somehow "gets used" to what I'm using and doesn't respond as well. Although this has been around for a relatively long time, I had not tried it. I have naturally curly hair that I color and Brazilian Blowout. I apply this mask when I go to bed and wash my hair in the morning. It makes my hair appreciably more shiney and soft. Great stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: Soft & Silky with a magnificent scent
customer_reviews.text: Everything that is awesome for my hair and to style it!!! The scent makes me feel exotic and it lasts for days. My hair is soft, manageable, and silky. Highly recommend this product! (This is from my daughter who gets the Brazilian keratin treatment as well as having several colors dyed in her hair. The picture is of her hair after using the Moroccan hair mask and Oil Treatment.)
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn M. Kash

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if its the real thing
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE their light oil and have been using for years. I ran out of my hair mask and decided to try their mask since their oil works so great for my hair. This mask is a little more expensive but I will pay anything for my hair to look better. When I tried I was not impressed, esp for the price. I have used $10 masks that seem just as good. Luckily I was able to return. The package was not sealed and lately I have been reading reviews about fake beauty products on amazon so I am thinking this may be the case. I ordered on a reputable site and will try it again.
customer_reviews.author: Sara T

customer_reviews.title: Best product ever for damaged hair!!!
customer_reviews.text: The very first time I used the Moroccan oil hydrating mask it softened my dry, frizzy, & damaged hair! It worked miracles!! It also provides shine! In just one treatment it brought my hair back to life & made it manageable again! Love all these Moroccanoil products!! Highly recommend for dry frizzy & chemical damaged hair!!
customer_reviews.author: northa w sanchez

customer_reviews.title: A-MA-ZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: I used this conditioner for a couple years then stopped for about 6 months. I purchased this one from Amazon last week and my hair has missed it sooooo much! It looks and smells exactly the same and my hair is once again smooth, soft, and manageable!!:) My hair just loves this stuff. I have bleach blonde, baby fine hair and it’s very dry and fragile. I’m so happy to have this back and probably won’t stop using it ever again. I’ve tried many different products and this one works best. I use once/wk, usually on the weekend when I can let it sit in my hair for 15-20 minutes. It’s so unbelievably soft.❤️
customer_reviews.author: Mamabb18Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Chemically Treated Hair
customer_reviews.text: I alternate between the Moroccan Oil "Restorative" mask and this "Intense Hydrating" mask. I'm not sure which is better. I have very dry, fragile hair from chemical straightening treatments and weekly flat-ironing. These hair masks help keep my hair healthy between all the damage I do.
customer_reviews.author: SadieTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I usually don’t write a review But this product was so bad that I felt I need to warn others. I have been using this hydrating mask for years and this time decided to buy it on Amazon. This made my hair very dry and a tangle mess. I didn’t think it can be this product until I read some of the reviews, people who had experienced the same problem. I stopped using it and my hair went back to normal. Just to make sure it was this product that caused the problem, I tried it again and had the same problem. Save your money and your hair.
customer_reviews.author: Sensible shopper

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit Product!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years and recently re-ordered it directly from Amazon. The product that I received has a different smell and much thinner consistency than the authentic product. It also left my hair tangled and feeling dryer than usual at comb out. I am returning it for a refund and vow never again to purchase this product from Amazon. I should have read the other comments warning people about this issue before purchasing the product. I am beginning to question the value of Amazon, as this is not the first time I have received fake products under their purview.
customer_reviews.author: Margo Gillman

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed dont order this
customer_reviews.text: I am so much disappointed to use this repeat order this time. It dosent have the same fragrance i used earlier. And same results too I ordered this earlier this year.. but just starting using this couple of weeks back .. this isnt the same as the other i used. I feel cheated for the money i spent.. i smells like some medicine.. though the packing is same like original. I havent used more than twice, but do i have a choice.?!
customer_reviews.author: Gagandeep Pahuja

customer_reviews.title: Excellent & I'm noticing a difference!
customer_reviews.text: I blow dry my hair a few times a week and use a flat iron or curling iron on my hair almost every day...I also dye my hair...so needless to say there is some damage. This is a great deep moisturizer! I can see the difference and it's only been a few weeks. I use it once a week and just follow the directions on the container.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Soft hair and Smells Incredible
customer_reviews.text: If you are someone who suffers from dry hair, then this is the product for you! I’ve had dry hair my whole life, and still do, but this product puts so much moisture back into my hair after every hair wash. And it’s smells amazing, just like all the other Moroccan Oil products. I’ve also found that my hair still smells like the product after flat ironing. Well worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Horrigan

customer_reviews.title: Stay away.
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend used to purchase this product. I purchased it for her as she was running out. Obvious this is fake. It is a lot thinner and lighter color than the original one. At first we thought perhaps they have changed the formula. After few tries, it is obvious this hair mask is so diluted that doesn’t have any effect on her hair after applying it. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Helps a little, costs a lot.
customer_reviews.text: So the product certainly isn’t horrible, but it’s not worth the money to be honest. Such a tiny tube for so much money and it has made little to no difference in my hair personally. It smells okay but not great compared to other Afghan oil products I’ve used. I e noticed a tad bit more shine in my hair after about 5 uses but not nearly enough to make me feel my purchase was worth it. You could probably get similar results with a cheaper product if I had to guess.
customer_reviews.author: Alissa

customer_reviews.title: It is pretty awful; every time I would brush my hair
customer_reviews.text: I usually have extremely healthy hair, but I had a lot of hair breakage after I bleached it for an ombre. It is pretty awful; every time I would brush my hair, I'd be completely covered in little bits of broken ends. I've been using this every time I wash my hair (about 2x a week) and leave it in from anywhere from 10-30 minutes. It's definitely made a huge improvement. My hair is much softer, doesn't break AS much, and it's not as poofy. I have naturally curly, wavy hair and the bleach really fried it. This is making a big difference for me and I'd highly recommend it, especially if you've got damaged hair.
customer_reviews.author: AlohaState

customer_reviews.title: Best deep treatment ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best deep treatment I’ve ever used. It smells good enough to eat. The rich, dense consistency is soft yet has enough structure to coat and hold my hair well in place. Covered with a terry towel, I sleep with it on overnight every other week. It makes my crazy curls look brand new in the morning. Long term, it just gives my hair a full drink of wellness and luxe.
customer_reviews.author: RBT

customer_reviews.title: Fermented product has bad smell
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased this same product 6 months ago at a local hair salon and loved the product and the wonderful smell. The same product I bought from amazon has a nasty smell and is not the same quality. My guess is that it is old and has fermented. I wanted to mail it back for a return however have not taken the time to do so. I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: My color-treated hair is soft again
customer_reviews.text: I've been dying my hair for a couple years now so it's really prone to breakage and frizz. I've used a couple conditioners and hair treatments and I think I like this one the best. I don't even use conditioner anymore, I just take a little bit of this and apply it on my hair after showering. It smells really nice, in my opinion If you're planning on using this after every wash, I recommend that you only use small amounts at a time because it's a pretty heavy product.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Kang

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for 4c dry hair
customer_reviews.text: I saw an amazing change I my hair moisture. I have 4c low porosity hair. So this mask works and helps so much. It says to wash it out but what I do is after the shower (I alsways wet my hair in the shower) i literally take a half dollar scoop and rub it in my hair as my hair dries ithe moisture stays leaving my hair completely soft and moisturerized all day. It's also changing my curl pattern which I love. The product does last a long time almost two months and I still have half a jar. The smell is amazing too.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Product 5 years expired
customer_reviews.text: I usually love this product....however bought on Amazon from BeautyAnd and recived. The expiration was from 2013. So give or take, im sure had a shelf life of at least a year. I recieved a 6 year old product that smelled of old glue is the best description I would give. I would not buy from this company again. Very dissatisfied!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Southerland

customer_reviews.title: Great product, super hydrating
customer_reviews.text: Great hair mask, I use it once a week! I typically shower and shampoo, get out and towel dry my hair and then comb this through with a wide tooth comb before piling my hair on my head in a cap. I leave it on for a while (15-30 minutes) before rinsing out in the sink with cool water. Leaves my hair soft and hydrated
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Coomber

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt soften my coarse hair..
customer_reviews.text: This mask surprisingly does not soften my hair. I have really coarse hair and my Kerastase conditioner softens my hair better than this mask does. Disappointed because Iove the smell.
customer_reviews.author: jmkwisconsin

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I received the product in a package that was badly damaged with multiple gaping holes and tears. I really don't know how it managed not to fall out. Upon opening it, it had an almost rancid odor, which is unlike any Moroccan Oil product I have ever encountered. The appearance was odd too. I wonder if it was just really old or not even Moroccan Oil. I guess the saying " you get what you pay for" applies here as it was priced much lower than usual.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Not sure its legitimate
customer_reviews.text: the smell is different. Agree with the reviewer that said it smells like cheap lotion. :( It' isn't t a bad conditioner, but I don't feel like it helped my hair much (curly 3b hair). I have bought other Moroccan oil products that are real on amazon though--so it's tricky. I won't buy hair shampoos/conditioners on amazon anymore. The scent is not like the original which makes me think it's not the same. Came in shrink-wrapped and with a date of expiration that showed it was not expired.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Firth

customer_reviews.title: did not like this product
customer_reviews.text: I have very thick hair and have tried everything to tame it and was really hoping this product worked I have used the oil and it worked ok for frizz however I did not like this at all it seemed to make my hair more frizzy and dry I used it as the directions stated and I am just glad I didnt buy the large size very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Ladybug

customer_reviews.title: Dried my hair
customer_reviews.text: For the price you would expect that it would be a miracle worker. This dried my hair worse than when I started. I wish I had never bought it. I think this would work well on wavy or semi-curly people but it did not work on my 3b hair. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended by someone I follow on Instagram and I was in love after the first use!! I used this instead of conditioner and I also used the oil treatment and my hair smells amazing, it feels amazing, it doesn’t seem as frizzy. My hair doesn’t get greasy or oily from either product. I will likely but the full size product next time.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great for damaged or processed hair!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! When I started using this mask, my hair dresser immediately noticed and asked what I was doing differently. It was the Moroccan Oil! It has a perfume smell that may bother some, but I've enjoyed the scent it leaves behind on my hair. Most importantly, it's helped my highly processed hair and I use it at least twice a week (I try to wash my hair only a few times a week anyway, as it's less damaging) One jar goes a long way and lasts a few months. A great deal on Amazon to boot!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Did not hydrate my dry, bleached highlights.
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to try this stuff, as I saw a very positive review on utube. However, I was very disappointed because it did not help my dry hair as I had expected. I already used this product twice with improvement only on that wash day. This product is not for me since I am looking for LONG TERM results (more than 1-2 days). I guess, I will just cut off my dry damaged curls!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Garcia

customer_reviews.title: This product works and smells amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product!! I can’t say enough great things about it. After one use I could tell a huge difference. I had recently had two bleach processes done and my hair was very dry and brittle looking. This brought my hair back to life! I used it as directed and then put a very, very small amount in my towel dried hair to leave in. I styled as usual and my hair felt and looked healthy and shiny again. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Quality has decreased tremendously!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always bought this hydrating mask and loved it. However, the last one I bought was very different, like if it were diluted. It showed less quality. The color is less intense, the smell is less intense and it is not hydrating well. Not sure what happened. I bought it in October, however I was waiting for the one I had before to finish to start using the new one. That is why it took me a while to write the review.
customer_reviews.author: Juliana Campos

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I use most of the products in this line. I don't follow the instructions as stated on the package, instead I apply it on to dry hair and leave it overnight. The next day I wash hair normal and style. Hair is shiny, healthy and super soft. Love the product.
customer_reviews.author: Mi2 Bookkeeping LLC

customer_reviews.title: Is original !!I love it !!
customer_reviews.text: I was so afraid to buy because some of the comments. Here . Do not be afraid to buy. Is original. Is very small . U only can user 4 time if u have a long hair but I will buy again here .
customer_reviews.author: Renata Maia

customer_reviews.title: Strong smell
customer_reviews.text: This product does the job. I have thick wavy hair. I wash and dey daily, color and high light every 6 weeks. It does what it says. The smell is roo much for me. It does linger even after washing. It you don't mind rhe smell it is a great product
customer_reviews.author: Lwilliams

customer_reviews.title: Intense moisturizer that smells great
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using Moroccanoil products for years. This hydrating mask not only does a great job of hydrating dry or chemically processed hair but smells wonderful as well.
customer_reviews.author: Carolr424

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this as well as the shampoo & conditioner and I have thick, coarse, wavy, frizzy hair and I have yet to find a product/hair mask that has worked as well as this one! After I used it in the shower, I let my hair air dry and it did not dry frizzy at all! It was smooth and soft and shiny and smelt amazing! If your having doubts about purchasing this, you should and you will not be sorry! I wish I would’ve found this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Fragrance too strong
customer_reviews.text: Fragrance is reeeeally strong. Stronger than any conditioner I’ve used before. Also container looked scratched with possibly some product missing. Maybe returned Idk. However hair feels soft and no frizz. But will try using less product next time
customer_reviews.author: KTD

customer_reviews.title: Great hydrating mask
customer_reviews.text: This is a very thick and oily mask that helps to nourish the hair and it does a great job. My wife's hair was badly damaged in a salon by improper coloring and this hydrating mask with the repair shampoo was the only thing that brought her hair back to life. After a month of treatment, it is almost 100% back to normal. Her new stylist recommended this to try to salvage her hair and it worked perfectly. Expensive but worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: avi8tor4life

customer_reviews.title: Not heavy feeling!  nice!
customer_reviews.text: Some of the hydrating mask leave your hair feeling like is double the weight... like if you were wearing a helmet or at least a towel on your head. This feels really light and makes a good job at hydrating ... I'm buying it again!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I'm back. I just received my order of 2...the large size. The best out there. This product is awesome. Now if you have thick hair or long hair or think long hair use this and another conditioner together. You want to put this conditioner on first and then something like Herbal Essence Hello Hydration (use quite a bit) and leave on for 30-45 mins. Your hair will love it. I use this back and forth with Redkin or Macadamian mask (do not use a lot use same method as above)
customer_reviews.author: ANLEA

customer_reviews.title: Light-weight mask! Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: What a great mask! It rinses perfectly, and it is super light! I am using it with MOROCCANOIL Repair shampoo! My hair feels hydrated, and less frizzy! I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: A. A.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite conditioner....
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite conditioner. I used to use it every thursday night and leave it in until my Friday or Saturday hair appointment. It had stopped my breakage and excessive shedding. It would leave my hair incredibly soft and manageable. The only down side was that after 2 years of using it, it stopped working. My hair felt like I had not conditioned it at all. Maybe my hair was over conditioned. So I switched conditioners for a while and from time to time I would try this again. Eventually it started to work. Now I am careful not to over use it and just use it as a deep conditioner once a month.
customer_reviews.author: T.W. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mask! I do recommend putting it on damp, towel-dried hair and leaving it in. I've tried using it in the shower and leaving it in....but my hair doesn't feel as luxurious. I'm not sure if my hair is too wet and it's diluting the mask.
customer_reviews.author: Marieanne

customer_reviews.title: Wear in your hair overnight, rinse out on the mornings you’ll thank me later.
customer_reviews.text: Best moisturizer for hair I’ve ever owned. Love all their products. A little on the pricey side, But only need a small amount it’s completely worth it! It lasts forever and smells really good too.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Best stuff ever
customer_reviews.text: Best stuff ever. I bought this in LV last year, when they used it on my hair in a salon, I've used it regularly since and my hair has never been in better shape. Not everything that is in Las Vegas should stay in Las Vegas
customer_reviews.author: Lori Henderson

customer_reviews.title: great for dry hair
customer_reviews.text: My hair is color treated and very dry, and I recently moved to a dry, western state. Although this is very expensive, I use this mask as a conditioner 3 to 4 times a week. It makes my hair very soft and moisturized, but not greasy or weighed down, which is something my hair is prone to with deep conditioners. I'm really happy with it and will purchase again when I run out, which I pray is no time soon. Update: I've now used this mask for 10 years, and I've never found anything that works as well for me. Sad because it's expensive since I use it now 2- 3 times a week but I wouldn't be without it!
customer_reviews.author: Liv

customer_reviews.title: Very potent scent
customer_reviews.text: Product works great, but the added perfume takes days to dissipate. If you are sensitive to scents, just use pure Moroccan oil. It's scent is actually very mild. Won't buy it again because of the perfumed scent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes my hair so soft and renewed
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. Makes my hair so soft, not frizzy, and feel healthy. I use this product once a week in the shower, comb it through my hair and let sit for about 10 minutes. It smells amazing! And a little goes a long way so this big tub is lasting me a really long time. I will buy this again once it runs out!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Leaves hair soft and shiny
customer_reviews.text: I have very thick long course hair, it made my hair soft and shiny I wash my hair with the shampoo and conditioner rung out as much water,as I can then take the paste and apply midway down my hair to the end, pinned it up bathed comb hair while in shower...smells fantastic ...will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Linda S.

customer_reviews.title: Not fake like some are saying
customer_reviews.text: So I ordered this product and afterwards I decided to look at the reviews (should’ve been the other way around I know) and I started seeing some people saying this was a fake product, it arrived damaged, or that there was product missing and I find all of that to be untrue. The product came sealed, not damaged, with no product missing and it smells amazing. I haven’t used it yet but I’m sure it’s going to be great just like it says it will be
customer_reviews.author: Ashley yost

customer_reviews.title: Definitely counterfeit product !!!
customer_reviews.text: This is silly of me but I have used and didnt check the product label after months of usage and realize that it is made in Thailand?? Definitely be aware and do not order from here !! only order it from the mainwebsite and authorize seller please
customer_reviews.author: Trang

customer_reviews.title: great product probably GONE BAD.
customer_reviews.text: Needed some right away and the distributor store is in another city so I next day Ordered a jar two weeks prior from here and it was fine. This jar was crusted around the edges and didn't smell or feel the same when I compared it to what I had left from the previous jar. It probably has been sitting for a while and is old. I will not be buying from this vendor again. Morrocanoil is one of a kind product and I highly recommend it..just from a trust worthy source.
customer_reviews.author: lightbright

customer_reviews.title: Real thing, not fake
customer_reviews.text: Awesome hair mask! Has no protein which I like (I’m protein sensitive) but my favorite thing of all is the scent!!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Brookshire

customer_reviews.title: The Best... Smells so Good!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this Hydrating Mask for several years now! It really works well & is so good for your hair....the Smell is Amazing! the BEST of anything else on the market....I used to buy it at my hair salon, but now will buy it here....give it a try, you will not be sorry!
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I have thick asian hair that is a bit frizzy. This DOES NOT control frizz, and I honestly didn't expect it too. However, it's super hydrating, the scent is super subtle. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Kim

customer_reviews.title: This product is perfect if you have dry, colored, coarse, curly hair
customer_reviews.text: My hair tends to become frizzy if I don't put the right kind of product in it. After two weeks of using this Oil, I could even stop using my conditioner because my hair felt very soft and was a lot less frizzy. I usually also apply a teaspoon of Moroccan Oil Intense Curl Cream before I dry my hair (always with a diffuser, of course), and it looks great. Quite frankly, I tried so many different products for my hair before I purchased this one, and none gave me the same results. I highly recommend it to anyone with coarse wavy/curly hair!
customer_reviews.author: Bimbetta

customer_reviews.title: Great conditioner
customer_reviews.text: Great moisturizer without weighing my hair down. I've used it twice already. Very happy with the results.
customer_reviews.author: LSPayor

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Really, really awesome. My hair is picky because it's really thick and oily, and this moisturizes it, makes it soft and bouncy, and doesn't leave the top oily. It's a little strong, but the smell doesn't stay in your hair too much when it's dry.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Have been using the product for over a month. Pretty good result. My hair is a lot smooth and looks much healthy. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Smooth sailing!
customer_reviews.text: I have very thick, coarse, and wavy to curly hair..this helped with frizz and softness. I think if you use too much it leaves hair heavy...try to keep it toward the ends.
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I like the way this product makes my hair feel. It has a pleasant scent. I would buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: MAGIC
customer_reviews.text: I've always loved the original Moroccan oil, so decided to try it in mask form. It's so wonderful and indulgent. Sometimes I use this as directed and leave it on for 10 minutes while I'm in the shower. Other times I've put it on damp hair and put a cap on overnight and rinse in the morning. Afterwards my hair is so soft and beautiful! And typically I'm one of those people who doesn't really see a whole lot of results in various hair care products. This, however, is magic. It's worth the splurge. I will be repurchasing when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Krepop

customer_reviews.title: not right- something wrong with quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this product normally, but what got delivered to me was sub par. Product that I got is clumpy and not spreadable. Not like it usually is. Texture is off. Not sure if I got old product or product that was damaged, but it just wasn't right. I will buy Moroccan Oil again, as I love the product but not from this vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Thornton

customer_reviews.title: I have used better ones. This is a famous brand and a ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used better ones. This is a famous brand and a lot of advertising is going around. Needed to try it on my hair to see if it's a good match. The result is okay. I assume it effects everyone differently. Plus, the water you wash your hair with, the other products you use on your hair and the sun and the weather can all have their own effects.. so one can't blame it on a single product to work or not work.
customer_reviews.author: MULTICOLOR

customer_reviews.title: I do like this mask for putting in my hair at the ...
customer_reviews.text: I do like this mask for putting in my hair at the beginning of the day (like up in a ponytail) (I don't really use it as suggested---I just leave it in for the day without rinsing it out). It helps calm the frizziness in my thin, frizzy hair. I haven't noticed that much long-term difference in my hair (and remember that I don't use as suggested). I do love the scent...it's not too strong, but leaves my hair smelling very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Chris d

customer_reviews.title: A great product.
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't believe in expensive hair products but I must say this conditioner is terrific and worth the price. I have thick wavy hair that tends to get dry and this product works. Just use a small amount on towel dried hair, leave in for at least 15 minutes and rinse.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Fine but not wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I've seen people commenting on that mask and I wanted to try it. My hair is dry, I normally use Argan mask and pay normally about 10$... So I bought that Moroccan mask and it come with the barcode scratched and pulled off for some reason ... I didn't like it as I felt it was fake or violated product but I choose to use it to try. My hair got soft but nothing extraordinary, I get the same result by using the Argan Oil mask! Never going to buy it again from that shop!
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: No way
customer_reviews.text: This product is not in its original packaging...sending back. I've bought this from the salon before and it's in a colored jar. This had a sticker on a white pump jar. Supposed to be white and its tan colored. Not okay to deceive customers
customer_reviews.author: jess

customer_reviews.title: Moisture in the driest of climates
customer_reviews.text: I am in LOVE with my hair again! I live in the desert, so my hair really needs moisture. Using this a couple times a week really gives my hair exactly what it needs.
customer_reviews.author: AllisonKM2

customer_reviews.title: great hydrating mask!
customer_reviews.text: I bought from amazon directly as the seller and I did infact get a genuine product. Love it! smells amazing, leaves my hair so soft and conditioned. I usually wash my hair, apply this mask for 10 minutes rinse and then apply my regular conditioner and my hair looks smells and feels amazing after every use.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: fantastic repair treatment
customer_reviews.text: fantastic repair treatment. I have infusions with chemo that are ongoing or the rest of my life and had some issues with my black hair that was died blonde for years. I had to stop the coloring to prevent more hair breakage and hair loss. Once I was able to get it healthy and using this product was a part of that process I am finally able after a couple years to go back to the blonde!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Bouncy not sticky hair!
customer_reviews.text: What I love about this is that it doesn't make the hair sticky or oily. My hair feels bouncy and beautiful when i use it :) Highly recommended So here is how I use it: I wash my hair with shampoo very well so it is not oily and clean. I then put the mask on it by dividing it into strands. By the end of this process, all my hair is covered with the mask. Just under my house there is a beautiful hair saloon which has a steamer. So I go use it for 20-30 minutes and wash it afterwards. It feels awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Salma Massoud

customer_reviews.title: great hydration
customer_reviews.text: repaired my damaged hair after two bleaches in less than a month
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fake product
customer_reviews.text: Returning it. This is not the original product I always buy, total scam.
customer_reviews.author: Iman

customer_reviews.title: Smoth
customer_reviews.text: The smell is so nice and they made my hair feel smoother. Relly like, i will keep using this one.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Great weekly conditioning treatment
customer_reviews.text: Great weekly conditioning treatment, even for colored hair. I use this after clarifying shampoo once a week for my daughter she is constantly in the pool which makes the hair brittle and green. After clarifying shampoo, hair is extremely dry and brittle feeling. Put this in your hair for about five minutes and your hair is silky and soft for at least a week! This stuff is great without a heavy, or greasy feel! Great price on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I damaged my hair accidentally and this product came highly recommended and while it has only been a month I can see definite improvement. Plan to use it for a long time for maintenance, keep my hair healthy. Already recommended it to my sister who is also using it.
customer_reviews.author: Pascale O

customer_reviews.title: Best conditioner
customer_reviews.text: Only conditioner that works for my highlighted hair Worth buying!!!!
customer_reviews.author: susan dolan

customer_reviews.title: Great hydrating mask
customer_reviews.text: This is a very thick and oily mask that helps to nourish the hair and it does a great job. My wife's hair was badly damaged in a salon by improper coloring and this hydrating mask with the repair shampoo was the only thing that brought her hair back to life. After a month of treatment, it is almost 100% back to normal. Her new stylist recommended this to try to salvage her hair and it worked perfectly. Expensive but worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: avi8tor4life

customer_reviews.title: My long hair loves it
customer_reviews.text: I have very long color treated hair and I need that extra moisture, this mask delivers! I love the scent too.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased this hair mask many times from stores and salons and have loved it. But after using the one I bought on Amazon a few times, I can’t get a comb through my hair. It also smells slightly different, especially when it’s on wet hair. I’m not sure if the one I received was fake or if it went bad before they shipped it, but I will not be continuing to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Gentile

customer_reviews.title: MAGICAL!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product has been recommended by my hairdresser after a full summer in pools and the ocean. After ONE APPLICATION my hair was noticeably softer and smoother! I WILL Be buying this product for my daughter!❤️
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Moroccanoil Intense Hydrating mask
customer_reviews.text: Thought it was a bigger container but awesome product for damaged hair
customer_reviews.author: NRi

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: This mask, mixed with the intense moisture repair conditioner works great. I'm not sure which of the products works best, or if it's the duo together, but my hair LOVES this brand. I like how their are no sulfites, parabens, or other harsh ingredients in this line. I have slightly frizzy (due to coloring), medium thick, middle of my back length hair. I don't think I'll ever use anything else. This helps cut the frizz and makes my hair really soft. Great price on amazon compared to salon prices!
customer_reviews.author: chaunch22

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed as the jar is usually full and this one was only 3/4 full so I'm thinking it was used and then returned. At this price, I will think again before ordering unless they replace it
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Hillier

customer_reviews.title: Totally a fake product
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a fake product (after using up the entire bowl). Ruined my Hair, Nexus hydrating conditioner is 100times better (15 bucks)
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Mok

customer_reviews.title: Luxurious curls
customer_reviews.text: My life style is hard on my hair. I swim daily. Moroccan Oil Hydrating Mask is the best product I have found to keep the dryness in control and makes my curls manageable.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the best brand, better than the knock-offs you see in ...
customer_reviews.text: I typically have very dry hair and this product works amazingly. It has lasted me a long time. This is the best brand, better than the knock-offs you see in the store these days that list their product as having argon oil in the product. This was the original before the argon oil trend. I notice it works best after I shampoo. Then I put in conditioner and apply to the tips and let sit for 5-10 minutes. I highly recommend and you should see instant results.
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: This stuff saves my hair!
customer_reviews.text: I just love using this mask. I have long hair and I constantly abuse it with the blow dryer and curling iron. This mask makes my hair feel so silky and moisturized and less guilty for all of the heat treating. I have yet to find another mask or conditioner that works as well. In fact, I sometimes use this as my normal conditioner on particularly heat-styled weeks and love it for that as well.
customer_reviews.author: C&E

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: The product is great! Gorgeous! Excellent.Im very happy with it.!
customer_reviews.author: Nelsi L.Laboy Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: Fraud
customer_reviews.text: Fraud! Or very old!! I have used this since it came out back way back when! This is fake or very very very old!
customer_reviews.author: Aprgregory

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is really great for keeping your hair hydrated
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is really great for keeping your hair hydrated. There is another version with a white cap that is less intense and I also use, but save this for when my hair really needs some extra care. I love this stuff, and won't be without it. I try to use at least 2 times a week (between this and the less intense hydration mask)
customer_reviews.author: D. Kapes

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this conditioner. I actually use it every time I shampoo my hair. It smells delicious and everyone asks what I use that smells so awesome. Hair is soft and shiny!! Love!’n
customer_reviews.author: shelley

customer_reviews.title: Anti-frizz and detangler
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this stuff. I use it everyday to keep my hair from being too frizzy due to its curly thickness. I recently started using it on my daughter's fine thin hair to help with knots in between shampooing days. It can be very costly but well worth its weight. I don't use it the way they tell you to as into rinsing it out, I keep it in my hair after it has been washed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glad I could try it first
customer_reviews.text: It's stuff is pretty expensive compared to what I currently use. Considering that hair type, heredity, diet, & other products used all may change how well this works for the individual; I wanted to see if it was what I need. I prefer the the oil (different purchase, same brand) over this cream. I gave this 4 stars bc I am happy I didn't waste $40 to figure this out. Although, it is environmentally irresponsible of me to have this shipped so far for so little - I digress.
customer_reviews.author: A Shopper

customer_reviews.title: A tad bit heavy, a little goes a long way!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product a while ago. Mask lasted a long time. Overall, happy with the purchase. Downfall, the mask is somewhat heavy. Wouldn't use it too frequent with fine hair. Love Moroccan Oil, but have since moved on to Light Argan Oils. If you have thick corse hair, this product would be perfect for you. If you have fine hair, a little bit goes a long way!
customer_reviews.author: ashley fareas

product_meta.title: Moroccanoil Intense Hydrating Hair Mask
product_meta.description:
Size:8.5 Fl OzMoroccanoil Intense Hydrating Mask is a high-performance, rich and creamy deep conditioner formulated for medium to thick, dry hair. Infused with antioxidant-rich argan oil, it intensely hydrates and conditions while dramatically improving hair's texture, elasticity, shine and manageability. Fragranced with the signature Moroccanoil scent, an exotic blend of spicy amber aromas and sweet floral notes.

BRAND STORY
A story of success, an impulse for innovation and a relentless pursuit of high-performing oil-infused beauty products fashioned an iconic brand: Moroccanoil.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
